Sentencas: This paper reports the evaluation of the electrochemically active region in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes through experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approaches.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: In the experiment, anodes with several different thicknesses were fabricated and their performance was measured to find its dependence on the anode thickness, microstructure and operating conditions.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: The three-dimensional (3D) microstructure of the anodes was imaged using focused ion beam scanning electron microscopy (FIB-SEM) and the microstructural parameters were quantified.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: One-dimensional (ID) and 3D numerical simulations based on the actual 3D microstructures were carried out to investigate the active thickness in the anodes.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: The validity of the numerical models was confirmed by comparing the results with the experiment.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: The active thickness, i.e., the electrochemically active region within the anode, is discussed using the verified simulation models to find its dependence on various conditions.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: The active thickness was found to depend on the microstructure and the operating conditions.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: We then attempted to find a simple expression for the active thickness useful for practical applications with semi-analytical discussion.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach

Sentencas: The developed descriptions expressed the quantitative dependence of the active thickness on the effective ionic conductivity, exchange current density and area-specific current density.
Titulo: Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach
Comprehensive understanding of the active thickness in solid oxide fuel cell anodes using experimental, numerical and semi-analytical approach
